content: Buses are diverting from Crown Street due to a police operation. Route 746 is diverting via Garfield Road East and missing four stops, and Route 671 is diverting via Windsor Road, Garfield Road East and Edmonds Street instead and missing two stops.
subtitle: Diversion in Riverstone

properties.speechText: In Riverstone, Buses are diverting from Crown Street due to a police operation. Route 7-4-6 is diverting via Garfield Road East and missing four stops, and Route 6-7-1 is diverting via Windsor Road, Garfield Road East and Edmonds Street instead and missing two stops.

lines.name: Sydney Buses Network 746
lines.description: Riverstone to Rouse Hill Town Centre

lines.description: Rouse Hill Town Centre to Riverstone
